metadata.title: CVE-2021-22176 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting with3.0.1. Improper access control allows demoted project members to accessdetails on authored merge requests

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
